parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the whitelist whose settings you want to modify.

parameters.name: ModifyMode
parameters.description:
The modification mode.

*   0: overwrites the original IP addresses and CIDR blocks in the whitelist.
*   1: adds the IP addresses and CIDR blocks to the whitelist.
*   2: removes the IP addresses and CIDR blocks from the whitelist.

>  We recommend that you set the value to 0.

parameters.name: SecurityIPList
parameters.description: The IP addresses and CIDR blocks in the whitelist.
